  • Uses of BaseCollection in com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.list

    Subclasses of BaseCollection in com.telenav.kivakit.core.collections.list
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BaseList<Value>
    A base class for bounded lists which adds convenient methods as well as support for various KivaKit interfaces: Appendable Copyable Indexable List Prependable RandomAccess Sectionable
    class 
    LinkedObjectList<Value>
    An ObjectList backed by a LinkedList.
    class 
    ObjectList<Value>
    A bounded list of objects with overrides of methods from BaseList to downcast return values to ObjectList for convenience.
    class 
    Stack<Value>
    ObjectList already contains push and pop functionality, but this class can make it clear when an ObjectList is being used as a stack.
    class 
    StringList
    A list of strings, adding useful string operations to ObjectList.
